mapper.select: /* 자주찾는질문 조회 */ SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(F.FAQ_NO, 'FAQ_', -1) AS UNSIGNED)) AS ROW_NUM, F.FAQ_NO, F.REG_PF_ID, C.FAQ_CTGRY_TYPE, F.FAQ_TTL, F.FAQ_CN, F.MDFCN_PF_ID, F.ACT_YN, F.REG_YMD, F.MDFCN_YMD FROM FREQUENTLY_ASKED_QUESTIONS AS F INNER JOIN FAQ_CATEGORY AS C ON F.FAQ_CTGRY_NO = C.FAQ_CTGRY_NO GROUP BY F.FAQ_NO ORDER BY F.REG_YMD ASC;
/* 자주찾는질문 카테고리 리스트 조회 */ SELECT FAQ_CTGRY_NO, FAQ_CTGRY_TYPE FROM FAQ_CATEGORY WHERE ACT_YN = 'Y';
mapper.update: /* 자주찾는질문 수정 */ UPDATE FREQUENTLY_ASKED_QUESTIONS SET FAQ_CTGRY_NO = #{faqCateNum}, FAQ_TTL = #{faqTitle}, FAQ_CN = #{faqContent}, MDFCN_PF_ID = #{faqMdfId}, ACT_YN = #{faqAct}, MDFCN_YMD = NOW() WHERE FAQ_NO = #{faqNum};
mapper.select: /* getFaqInfoByNum 자주찾는질문 조회 */ SELECT F.FAQ_NO, F.REG_PF_ID, F.FAQ_CTGRY_NO, C.FAQ_CTGRY_TYPE, F.FAQ_TTL, F.FAQ_CN, F.MDFCN_PF_ID, F.ACT_YN, F.REG_YMD, F.MDFCN_YMD FROM FREQUENTLY_ASKED_QUESTIONS AS F INNER JOIN FAQ_CATEGORY AS C ON F.FAQ_CTGRY_NO = C.FAQ_CTGRY_NO WHERE F.FAQ_NO = #{faqNum};
